name: Henri's Secret 2
storyline:
The sequel of the "Henri's Secret" visual novel...

Summer is evaporating little by little, much to Lyla's regret, who spent beautiful moments by the sides of her friends and Henri.

Split between her still unclear ambitions and studies that don't motivate her, Lyla is having trouble finding her place... Her friends are a real support, as always, as well as the love that Henri brings her.

But celebrity life isn't easy, and the calm daily life of the two lovebirds will be put to the test! Especially since Sheran, the musical revelation of the moment, has entered into Jay's life...

Will the love between Lyla and Henri survive the tumult of Jay's life as a star?
summary: Henri's Secret 2 is a sequel to 2017's visual novel created by Nineland and developed by Beemoov, where you continue to live the adventures of Lyla, a student who has found love. Mystery and passion await you in this interactive novel! Discover an exciting romance where friendship, humor, passion, and... superstars come together!
